data.title: Praise From the Courts
data.text:
Excellent...Among the most experienced and well-qualified in this country in securities fraud litigation.

United States District Court for the Northern District of California

Some of the best trial lawyers I've ever seen.

United States District Court for the Northern District of California

Numerous district court judges from across the country have commented on the outstanding performance of Bernstein Litowitz.

United States District Court for the Northern District of Ohio

The Court has the utmost confidence in plaintiff's counsel... [BLB&G] has performed its work at every juncture with integrity and competence.

United States District Court for the Southern District of New York

The unique talents of [these] plaintiffs' lawyers...are just simply not available in the mainstream of litigators.

United States District Court for the District of Oregon

A cut above the typical lawyering I have seen.

United States District Court for the Middle District of Tennessee

[E]xcellent settlements of uncommon amount engineered by highly skilled counsel with reasonable cost to the Class.

United States District Court for the District of New Jersey

The quality of the representation has been superb and is unsurpassed in this court's experience.

United States District Court for the Southern District of New York

I have a lot of confidence in [BLB&G]...[they] are vigorous representatives...a terrific plaintiff firm...[they] take [their] responsibilities to the court very seriously.

United States District Court for the Southern District of New York

A tremendous job...[N]ot only in the monetary result, but the substantial and very innovative programmatic relief obtained in this case...these lawyers did an outstanding job trying to make sure that's the kind of thing that this case left behind.

United States District Court for the Southern District of Texas

Excellent qualifications and reputation...great patience...brought about sweeping corporate reforms that may be invaluable.

United States District Court for the Middle District of Tennessee

The efforts put into this case are excellent...You'd hold up this case as an example of what to do...It shows precisely the type of benefits you can achieve for stockholders and how representative litigation can be a very important part of our corporate governance system.

Delaware Court of Chancery

This was an incredibly complex, detailed case…. a case that required real expert advocacy on part of the class and that was provided by class counsel.... The fact that you got a recovery of this size is tremendous credit to you….You just did a terrific job on behalf of your clients ... I congratulate you.

United States District Court for the District of Vermont
